prompts: In the /specs directory review the plan for the blog improvement and begin implementing it on a new branch.
commit changes to a new branch and run the app locally so I can review

There is a major problem with the content navigator because it's floating within the horizontal pane. It appears to cover different elements of the UI. Let's refactor this to make that a sidebar. The Content Navigator or Table of Contents should exist on the left-hand side of the application window and as you scroll down it will highlight the different sections that you're in. This is a much better way to allow us to continue to navigate and access content without impacting or reducing the effectiveness or quality of reading the content. Use the Puppeteer MCP as needed to review the fixes
Looks good. lets commit and push changes
There's a problem with previewing the Mermaid diagrams. Update the Mermaid diagram skill to include a verification step that makes sure that the diagrams themselves can render
